src:
REZZIME DANA (sreda): Grupa C pravi horor, svaka čast Realu, Juventusu, PSŽ i Bajernu
Pogledajte ko vam je 6. novembra doneo novac, a ko vas je prodao...

06 Nov 2019

NAPOMENA: U rubrici REZZIME DANA novinari portala MOZZART Sport koriste podatke kladionice MOZZART o najigranijim parovima tog dana, i na osnovu toga sumiraju koji su od najigranijih tipova prošli, a koji nisu.
OVDE pogledajte kako smo mi prošli u rubrici PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA.
Evo kako ste vi tipovali...

ZAOKRUŽENO


BAJERN - OLIMPIJAKOS (tip 1, kvota 1,20) - rezultat 2:0

Bajern Minhen je prvi učesnik osmine finala Lige šampiona! Iza Bavaraca su teški dani, smena trenera Nika Kovača, katastrofa u Frankfurtu (1:5), problemi u svlačionici...ali faza stabilizacije uspešno je započeta. S privremenim rešenjem na klupi u liku Hansija Flika, nemački šampion tukao je Olimpijakos (2:0) i pored toga što je dva kola pre kraja grupne faze prebrinuo osnovne brige (osim borbe za prvo mesto), učinio veliku uslugu Crvenoj zvezdi. Onda i kladiocima.
Opširnije OVDE.

LOKOMOTIVA MOSKVA - JUVENTUS (tip 2, kvota 1,65) - rezultat 1:2

Teško da je moglo da bude bolnije za fudbalske fanatike u Moskvi. Lokomotiva je hrabro izašla na crtu Kristijanu Ronaldu i favorizovanom Juventusu, dugo je izgledalo da je na koraj barem od proleća u Ligi Evrope, ali je posle traumatičnog početka usledio još gori kraj. Daglas Kosta je u trećem minutu sudijske nadoknade zavrteo mozak kompletnoj odbrani ruskog tima i pogodio za konačnih 2:1 i prolaz Stare dame u osminu finala Lige šampiona.
Opširnije OVDE.

CRVENA ZVEZDA – TOTENHEM (tip 2, kvota 1,65) – rezultat 0:4

Kada bi se brojale velike šanse, bilo ih je po tri, četiri na obe strane. Kada se broje golovi bila su četiri u mreži Milana Borjana i nijedan u iza golmana Gazanige. Kada se gleda igra, Totenhemova je bila bolja i donela je zasluženu pobedu od 4:0 na Marakani. Previsoku? Svakako! Ali u Ligi šampiona se svaka škola skupo plaća. Zvezda to zna, ali je večeras baš izabrala naivne lekcije da ih ponavlja. Kao protiv Pari Sen Žermena kući ili Napolija tamo.
Opširnije OVDE.

REAL MADRID - GALATASARAJ (tip 1, kvota 1,20) - rezultat 6:0

Noć za pamćenje. Jeste na stadionu „Santjago Bernabeu“ gostovao skromni Galatasaraj, ali dešavanja posebno u prvih 45 minuta ostaće duboko memoriji Realovih navijača. Madriđani su počistili sa terena turskog predstavnika i posle zabrinjavajućeg početka (samo jedan bod iz početna dva kola) stigli nadomak naredne faze Lige šampiona, usput ispisavši nove stranice klupske i istorije elitnog takmičenja – 6:0.
Opširnije OVDE.

PSŽ - KLUB BRIŽ (tip 1, kvota 1,23) - rezultat 1:0

Real je bio ubedljiv, ali mu je to dovoljno tek za drugo mesto. Zasad. Priliku da smanji zaostatak za liderom imaće u narednom kolu, na istom mestu, ali se izvgesnijim čini da Pari Sen Žermen dobije, uslovno, lakšeg rivala u osmini finala. Posebno što je prvak Francuske već osigurao plasmanu nokaut fazu, još jednim trijjumfom nad Klub Brižom – 1:0.
Opširnije OVDE.

LEVSKI – ETAR (tip 1, kvota 1,15) – rezultat 3:0

Sigurna, ubedljiva pobeda Levskog koji je na krilima svojih stranaca overio važna tri boda. Već u 24. minutu Ejolfson je probio led i doveo Levski u vođstvo koje je Paulinjo duplirao u uvodnim taktovima drugog poluvremena. Sve je bilo rešeno u 68. minutu kada je Alar iskoristio Paulinjovu asistenciju i stavio tačku.

PRECRTANO


GIMARAIŠ – ARSENAL (tip 2, kvota 2,15) – rezultat 1:1

Engleski mediji su se dobro našalili na fotografiju dvojice Arsenalovih igrača kako leže na travi u finišu prvog poluvremena. Možda je do povreda, ali sasvim je moguće bilo i da su zaspali. Jer baš toliko dosadan bio je sudar Vitorije Gimaraiš i Tobdžija na premijeri četvrtog kola Lige Evrope. Sve do pred sam finiš meča u kome smo gledali “pražnjenje“ akumulirane energije. Na kraju 1:1 u četvrtom kolu Grupe F što je rezultat kojim bi i jedni i drugi mgli da budu nezadovoljni. Arsenal pošto je sve do sudijske nadoknade imao gol prednosti, a Vitorija jer je objektivno bila bolja ekipa na terenu. 
Opširnije OVDE.

LEVERKUZEN – ATLETIKO MADRID (tip 2, kvota 2,65) – rezultat 2:0

Glava boli, a aspirini ne prijaju Dijegu Simeoneu. Nije toliko ni do toga što je Bajer u Leverkuzenu slavio sa uverljivih 2:0 koliko zbog utiska da je Atletiko odigrao najgorih 90 minuta u sezoni u kojoj je ruku na srce bilo veoma loših perioda za Jorgandžije. Ali ovo večeras? Neobjašnjivo.
Opširnije OVDE.

ATALANTA - MANČESTER SITI (tip 2, kvota 1,55) - rezultat 
1:1

Uspela je Boginja provincije da izvuče prvi bod u Ligi šampiona, ali to vama nikako nije odgovaralo. Istina, Siti je u sigurnoj zoni pošto će se Dinamo i Šahtjor definitivno juriti do poslednjeg kola za poziciju broj dva. Ko zna šta bi se desilo da je Gabrijel Žezus u finišu prvog dela podebljao vođstvo koje je doneo Sterling na otvaranju meča. Ovako, hladan tuš doneo je Mario Pašalić u 49. minutu, a posle crvenog kartona Klaudija Brava i taj bod je bio upitan. Velika šteta.
Opširnije OVDE.

DINAMO ZAGREB – ŠAHTJOR (tip 1, kvota 2,50) – rezultat 3:3

Kakva utakmica, kakva ludnica! Šest golova, dva crvena kartona i mnogo propuštenih šansi na obe strane. Već u prvih 25 minuta bilo je 1:1, gde je Petković anulirao rani pogodak Alana Patrika. Ali, onda je tek usledio šou... Dinamo je postigao dva brza pogotka u 83. i 89. minutu, ali onda se dogodio potop. Prvo je Moraeš u trećem minutu nadoknade prepolovio zaostatak, da bi Tete postigao gol s bele tačke u čak osmom minutu nadoknade! Kakva završnica i kakav pad na tiketima...
Opširnije OVDE.
Foto: Shutterstock
text:
DAILY SUMMARY (Wednesday): Group C makes horror, every honor to Real, Juventus, PSG and Bayern
Look who brought you the money on November 6 and who sold you ...

06 Nov 2019

NOTE: In the DAY SUMMARY section, MOZZART Sport reporters use the MOZZART bookmakers' data on the most played pairs of the day, summarizing which of the most played types have passed and which have not.
See here how we went in the PROPOSALS AND TYPES section.
Here's how you guys typed ...

ROUNDED


BAYERN - OLYMPIAKOS (type 1, odds 1,20) - result 2: 0

Bayern Munich is the first participant in the eighth Champions League final! Behind the Bavarians are tough days, the change of coach Nick Kovac, the Frankfurt disaster (1: 5), the locker room problems ... but the stabilization phase has started successfully. With a temporary solution on the bench in the form of Hansi Flik, the German champion beat Olympiacos (2-0) and in spite of the fact that two rounds before the end of the group stage he overcame his basic concerns (apart from the fight for the first place), he did a great service to the Red Star. Then to the bookies.
Read more HERE.

LOCOMOTIVE MOSCOW - JUVENTUS (type 2, odds 1.65) - result 1: 2

It could hardly have been more painful for football fanatics in Moscow. The locomotive has boldly drawn on the line of Christian Ronald and the favored Juventus, it has long seemed to bark at least since spring in the Europa League, but after a traumatic start, an even worse end came. Douglas Costa turned his brain to complete defense of the Russian team in the third minute of refereeing and hit for the final 2-1 and the Old Lady's passage to the eighth Champions League final.
Read more HERE.

RED STAR - TOTENHEM (type 2, odds 1.65) - score 0: 4

When the odds were high, there were three, four on each side. In scoring, there were four in Milan Borjan's net and none in behind the Gazaniga goalkeeper. When watching the game, Tottenham's was better and brought a well-deserved 4-0 win over Marakana. Too high? Certainly! But in the Champions League, every school is expensive. The star knows this, but tonight she just chose naive lessons to repeat. Like against Paris Saint-Germain home or Napoli there.
Read more HERE.

REAL MADRID - GALATASARAJ (tip 1, odds 1,20) - result 6: 0

A night to remember. The modest Galatasaray was hosted at the Santiago Bernabeu, but the events especially in the first 45 minutes will remain deeply in the memory of Real fans. The Madrid team cleared the field of the Turkish representative and after a worrying start (only one point from the first two rounds) arrived near the next stage of the Champions League, by the way, writing new pages of club and elite competition history - 6-0.
Read more HERE.

PSG - CLUB BRIZ (type 1, odds 1,23) - result 1: 0

Real was convincing, but only enough for second place. For now. They will have the opportunity to reduce the leaderboard in the next round, in the same place, but it seems more likely that Paris Saint-Germain will get a conditionally easier rival in the eighth finals. Especially since the French champion has already secured the knockout stage, with another triumph over Club Brugge - 1-0.
Read more HERE.

LEVSKI - ETAR (Type 1, odds 1.15) - Result 3: 0

A sure, convincing victory for Levski, who scored an important three points on the wings of his foreigners. Already in the 24th minute, Ejolfson broke the ice and led Levski into the lead, which Paulino doubled in the opening half-time kicks. It all worked out in the 68th minute when Alar used Paulinho's assist and put the point in.

PRECRTANO


GIMARAIŠ - ARSENAL (tip 2, odds 2,15) - result 1: 1

The English media made a good joke about a photo of two Arsenal players lying on the grass in the first half finish. It may be the injuries, but it was quite possible they were asleep. Because just as annoying was the collision of Vitoria Guimarais and Tobias at the premiere of the fourth round of the Europa League. Until the very end of the match where we were looking at the "discharge" of accumulated energy. At the end of 1: 1 in Group Four of Group F, the result of which both would be dissatisfied. Arsenal had a goal advantage until the referee and Vitoria because it was objectively a better team on the pitch.
Read more HERE.

Leverkusen - ATLETICO MADRID (tip 2, odds 2,65) - result 2: 0

The head hurts, but the aspirins do not please Diego Simeone. It is not so much that Bayer Leverkusen celebrated with a convincing 2-0, but because of the impression that Atletico played the worst 90 minutes in a season in which hand-to-heart there were very bad periods for the Georgians. But this tonight? Inexplicable.
Read more HERE.

ATALANTA - MANCHESTER SITI (Type 2, Odds 1.55) - Result
1: 1

The goddess of the province managed to get the first point in the Champions League, but it didn't suit you. True, City are in the safe zone as Dynamo and Shakhtar will definitely race to the last round for position number two. Who knows what would have happened if Gabriel Jesus had bolded the lead that Sterling had brought to the opening match in the first half. Mario Pašalić got a cold shower in the 49th minute, and after a red card by Claudio Bravo, that point was questionable. Great damage.
Read more HERE.

Dinamo Zagreb - Shakhtar (type 1, odds 2.50) - result 3: 3

What a match, what a madhouse! Six goals, two red cards and many missed chances on both sides. In the first 25 minutes it was 1: 1, where Petkovic canceled Alan Patrick's early goal. But then the show just followed ... Dinamo scored two quick hits in the 83rd and 89th minutes, but then there was a deluge. First, Moraes halved the gap in the third minute of play, for Tete to score from the white spot in the eighth minute of play! What a finish and what a drop on the tickets ...
Read more HERE.
Photo by Shutterstock
